      • Dot

        public static double Dot(int n,
                         double[] dx,
                         int incx,
                         double[] dy,
                         int incy)
        ddot.c
        Parameters:
        n - number of elements
        dx - n+1 vector (dx[0] is not used)
        incx - storage spacing between elements of dx
        dy - n+1 vector (dy[0] is not used)
        incy - storage spacing between elements of dy
        Returns:
        dot product of dx and dy

      • findMaxMagnitude

        public static int findMaxMagnitude(int n,
                                   double[] dx,
                                   int incx)
        idamax.c Find largest component of double vector dx
        Parameters:
        n - number of elements
        dx - n+1 vector (dx[0] is not used)
        incx - storage spacing between elements of dx
        Returns:
        smallest index

      • calAX

        public static double[] calAX(int n,
                             double da,
                             double[] dx,
                             int incx,
                             int start)
        dscal.c scalar vector multiplication
        Parameters:
        n - number of elements
        da - double scalar multiplier
        dx - start+n-1 vector (dx[0] is not used)
        incx - storage spacing between elements of dx (should be positive)
        start - start position
        Returns:
        da*dx

      • calAXPlusY

        public static double[] calAXPlusY(int n,
                                  double da,
                                  double[] dx,
                                  int incx,
                                  double[] dy,
                                  int incy,
                                  int xstart,
                                  int ystart)
        daxpy.c
        Parameters:
        n - number of elements
        da - double scalar multiplier
        dx - start+n-1 vector (dx[0] is not used)
        incx - storage spacing between elements of dx
        dy - start+n-1 vector (dy[0] is not used)
        incy - storage spacing between elements of dy
        ystart - start position of y
        xstart - start position of x
        Returns:
        da * dx + dy

      • LUDecomposition

        public static odesolver.ReturningValues LUDecomposition(double[][] a,
                                                        int n)
        LU decomposition using partial pivoting
        Parameters:
        a - (n+1)x(n+1) matrix
        n - dimension
        Returns:
        a, ipvt, info if info != 0, the matrix is singular

      • solveLinearSys

        public static double[] solveLinearSys(double[][] a,
                                      int n,
                                      int[] ipvt,
                                      double[] b)
        solves the linear system using the factors computed by LUDecomposition
        Parameters:
        a - (n+1)x(n+1) matrix
        n - row dimension of a
        ipvt - the pivot vector from LUDecomposition
        b - the right hand side vector
        Returns:
        b the solution vector x.
